Name: Bow - Sakura
Description: In life, be as splendid as cherry blossoms dancing in the wind. in death, be as silent as fallen leaves returning to the roots!
Description$english: In life, be as splendid as cherry blossoms dancing in the wind. in death, be as silent as fallen leaves returning to the roots!
Description2$english: After equipping, the weapon's appearance will be replaced with: Bow - Sakura.
